tool_description: The Calculate Working Day API simplifies date-based calculations for developers. It swiftly determines the next working day, automating the process and boosting efficiency. Beyond basic calculations, it allows customisation by accommodating specific working day patterns. Additionally,     it seamlessly integrates UK bank holidays for precise results. This API enhances precision and efficiency in date-based computations, making it an invaluable tool for developers.
name: Calculate Working Days
title: Calculate Working Days

api_list.name: Is Today A Working Day
api_list.description: This action uses multiple variables to determine if today is a working day for you.  For more information, please see https://mightora.io/calculate-working-day

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: This is the input date in YYYY-MM-DD format. e.g. 2022-12-23

required_parameters.name: working_days
required_parameters.description: This parameter expects a comma-separated list of working days, where Monday is 1, Tuesday is 2, and so on. In the default, we're using all weekdays from Monday to Friday, so the value is '1,2,3,4,5'.

optional_parameters.name: non_working_days
optional_parameters.description: A custom list of non-working days, this could be a list of days where service is not available. In a string as a list, format YYYY-MM-DD,YYYY-MM-DD  e.g. 2022-12-28,2022-12-29,2022-12-30

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: Currently, only the United Kingdom is supported. Values can be england-and-wales, scotland, northern-ireland

api_list.name: Next Working Day
api_list.description: This action uses multiple variables to determine what your working days are in order to return the correct Next Working Day after the date you provide.  For more information, please see https://mightora.io/calculate-working-day

required_parameters.name: working_days
required_parameters.description: This parameter expects a comma-separated list of working days, where Monday is 1, Tuesday is 2, and so on. In the default, we're using all weekdays from Monday to Friday, so the value is '1,2,3,4,5'.

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: This is the input date in YYYY-MM-DD format. e.g. 2022-12-23

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: Currently, only the United Kingdom is supported. Values can be england-and-wales, scotland, northern-ireland

optional_parameters.name: non_working_days
optional_parameters.description: A custom list of non-working days, this could be a list of days where service is not available. In a string as a list, format YYYY-MM-DD,YYYY-MM-DD  e.g. 2022-12-28,2022-12-29,2022-12-30

api_list.name: Basic Next Working Day
api_list.description: Finds the next working day based on a working week of Monday to Friday. For more information, please see https://mightora.io/calculate-working-day

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: This is the input date in YYYY-MM-DD format. e.g. 2022-12-23

api_list.name: Combined
api_list.description: Performs a combination of all of the endpoints in one response. For more information please see https://mightora.io/calculate-working-day

required_parameters.name: working_days
required_parameters.description: This parameter expects a comma-separated list of working days, where Monday is 1, Tuesday is 2, and so on. In the default, we're using all weekdays from Monday to Friday, so the value is '1,2,3,4,5'.

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: This is the input date in YYYY-MM-DD format. e.g. 2022-12-23

required_parameters.name: x_working_days
required_parameters.description: Find working day in X days e.g. 4

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: Currently, only the United Kingdom is supported. Values can be england-and-wales, scotland, northern-ireland

optional_parameters.name: non_working_days
optional_parameters.description: A custom list of non working days, this could be a list of days where service is not available. In a string as a list, format YYYY-MM-DD,YYYY-MM-DD  e.g. 2022-12-28,2022-12-29,2022-12-30

api_list.name: Date In X Working Days
api_list.description: This action uses multiple variables to determine what the working day will be in X working days’ time.  For more information, please see https://mightora.io/calculate-working-day

required_parameters.name: x_working_days
required_parameters.description: Find working day in X days e.g. 4

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: This is the input date in YYYY-MM-DD format. e.g. 2022-12-23

required_parameters.name: working_days
required_parameters.description: This parameter expects a comma-separated list of working days, where Monday is 1, Tuesday is 2, and so on. In the default, we're using all weekdays from Monday to Friday, so the value is '1,2,3,4,5'.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: Currently, only the United Kingdom is supported. Values can be england-and-wales, scotland, northern-ireland

api_list.name: FirstAndLastWorkingDayOfMonth
api_list.description: This action uses multiple variables to determine what your First and Last working days of a given month are.  For more information, please see https://mightora.io/calculate-working-day

optional_parameters.description: A custom list of non-working days, this could be a list of days where service is not available. In a string as a list, format YYYY-MM-DD,YYYY-MM-DD  e.g. 2022-12-28,2022-12-29,2022-12-30
